ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: You could actually make fireworks now as they are trivial at 50 and you start with 50 skill. :) QdP 52 Gnomish Magi Ilsik Haucil Master Tinker (152) Quasinom
ygData.messageBody:
You could actually make fireworks now as they are trivial at 50 and you
start with 50 skill. :)

QdP
52 Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Master Tinker (152)

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
